typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_AcceptedAnswerId} as long,
		{_AnswerCount} as long,
		{_Body} as string,
		{_ClosedDate} as string,
		{_CommentCount} as long,
		{_CommunityOwnedDate} as string,
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_FavoriteCount} as long,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_LastActivityDate} as string,
		{_LastEditDate} as string,
		{_LastEditorDisplayName} as string,
		{_LastEditorUserId} as long,
		{_OwnerDisplayName} as string,
		{_OwnerUserId} as long,
		{_ParentId} as long,
		{_PostTypeId} as long,
		{_Score} as long,
		{_Tags} as string,
		{_Title} as string,
		{_ViewCount} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SrcPost
source(output(
		{_Count} as long,
		{_ExcerptPostId} as long,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_TagName} as string,
		{_WikiPostId} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcTags
SelectPost, SelectTags join(SelectPost@PostId == SelectTags@PostId,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinPostTags
DrvUnknown select(mapColumn(
		PostId = SelectPost@PostId,
		LastActivityDate,
		TagName
	)) ~> Select
Select aggregate(groupBy(TagName),
	Count = count(PostId),
		LastActivityDate = max(LastActivityDate)) ~> AggrTags
SrcTags select(mapColumn(
		PostId = {_ExcerptPostId},
		TagId = {_Id},
		TagName = {_TagName}
	)) ~> SelectTags
JoinPostTags derive(TagName = iifNull(TagName,'Unknown') ) ~> DrvUnknown
SrcPost select(mapColumn(
		PostId = {_Id},
		LastActivityDate = {_LastActivityDate}
	)) ~> SelectPost
AggrTags sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	mapColumn(
		{_TagName} = TagName,
		{_Count} = Count,
		LastActivityDate
	)) ~> DestPostsByTags
